q: Egypt's minister of state for antiquities Zahi Hawass said on Sunday. The objects stolen by looters include "a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess" and parts of a gilded wood statue of Tutankhamun harpooning, a statement on Zahi Hawass ' website read.
